alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 6:37PM EDT until July 26 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... Southern Erie County in northwestern Pennsylvania... Crawford County in northwestern Pennsylvania... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 636 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Albion to near Andover to near Orwell, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Meadville, Conneaut, Corry, Edinboro, Titusville, Union City, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Albion, Andover, Linesville, Adamsville, Canadohta Lake, Pymatuning Central, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Pymatuning North and Atlantic. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
